tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_sources ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    source_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    sustainability_score INT 
);

CREATE TABLE SolarPanels (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand TEXT,
    capacity FLOAT,
    efficiency FLOAT,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WindTurbines (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand TEXT,
    capacity FLOAT,
    rotor_diameter FLOAT,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    panel_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_type VARCHAR(255),
    panel_capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE wind_turbines (
    turbine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    turbine_type VARCHAR(255),
    turbine_capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE hydroelectric_plants (
    plant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_type VARCHAR(255),
    plant_capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SolarPanels (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    capacity FLOAT,
    efficiency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WindTurbines (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    height FLOAT,
    blade_length FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE HydroelectricPlants (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    capacity FLOAT,
    water_flow_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityMetrics (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    metric_name TEXT,
    value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    efficiency FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE wind_turbines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    diameter FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE hydroelectric_plants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE sustainability_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_sources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity FLOAT
)
